author: trustin
msg: * Moved JavaBeans PropertyEditors to org.apache.mina.integration.beans in mina-core because these editors are shared among all IoC containers - Springframework, JBoss Microcontainer and PicoContainer

msg: Fixed some i18n issues, use POST for forms which manipulate the server content

author: andreas
msg: User screen: link to group page instead of group profile editing page

author: sebb
msg: Errors only flag is now supported when loading XML and CSV files

msg: Wrap setting of expiration header in language-exists action to avoid an exception
